en: We can not encourage communalism or narrow - mindedness , for no nation can be great whose people are narrow in thought or in action .
baseline: 我们不能鼓励共产主义或狭隘思想,因为没有一个民族能够伟大,其人民在思想和行动上是狭隘的。

en: To the nations and peoples of the world we send greetings and pledge ourselves to cooperate with them in furthering peace , freedom and democracy .
baseline: 我们向世界各国和人民致敬,并承诺与他们合作促进和平、自由和民主。

en: Washington , D.C. – Speaker Nancy Pelosi delivered remarks on the Floor of the House of Representatives in support of H. R. 1280 , the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act of 2021 .
baseline: 华盛顿 — — 美国众议院发言人佩洛西在众议院会议厅发表了讲话,支持《2021年乔治·弗洛伊德警察法》的1280号法案。

en: We can not stay silent when one – when our most vulnerable and historically marginalized communities , people of color , those living in poverty , Americans with disabilities are being targeted and sometimes killed .
baseline: 当我们最脆弱和历史上被边缘化的社区、肤色人、生活在贫困、残疾的美国人被当作目标和有时被杀的时候,我们不能保持沉默。

en: Thank you to the Congressional Black Caucus and its Chair , Joyce Beatty .
baseline: 感谢国会黑人委员会及其主席乔伊斯·贝蒂.

en: All of us here salute and are proudly , profoundly grateful to our law enforcement heroes .
baseline: 我们大家在这里向执法英雄们致敬,并感到自豪,深表感谢。
zh: 我们大家在这里向执法英雄表示敬意,并以自豪、深深的感激.

en: And they had a motto about the police : ‘ Be true to the men in blue . ’
baseline: 他们有一个关于警察的口号: “ 忠于蓝色的人们. ”

en: All of us here , again , salute and profoundly grateful for our law enforcement heroes .
baseline: 我们大家在这里,再次向执法英雄们表示敬意和深切感谢。
zh: 我们大家,再次,对我们的执法英雄表示敬意,并深表感谢.

en: I said , ‘ Only if you think it is worthy of your brother . ’
baseline: 我说, “ 只有你认为它值得你兄弟的. ”
zh: 我说,‘只有你认为它值得你兄弟的.’
